dct_title_s: Official railway map of the state of Vermont
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading, hachures and spot heights.; Shows steam railroads and electric railroads.; "Manufactured by the National Survey, Chester, Vt."; "Copyright 1924 by Aaron H. Grout, Secretary of State for the State of Vermont."; Includes index to railroads.
dct_publisher_sm: Secretary of State for the State of Vermont (Montpelier,  Vt), 1924
